alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 4:40PM PDT until July 19 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Mono County in northern California... West central Mineral County in western Nevada... * Until 530 PM PDT. * At 438 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Bodie, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Brawley Peaks, Aurora, along the California-Nevada State Line or 4 miles east of Bodie State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
